mapper.update: update ts_teacher set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduated = #{graduated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, political = #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_year = #{entryYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_dept = #{entryDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, professional = #{professional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, professional_time = #{professionalTime,jdbcType=DATE}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tno = #{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tno, name, password, birth, degree, graduated, political, entry_year, entry_dept, professional, professional_time, dept_id from ts_teacher where tno = #{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select tno, name, password, birth, degree, graduated, political, entry_year, entry_dept, professional, professional_time, dept_id from ts_teacher
